column3: Recast to reflect Peoples as discontinued operations as described in Note 4 to the Consolidated Financial Statements. EPS amounts reflect the per share impact of the recast.
Includes income tax expense (benefit) of $21 million, $16 million and $(76) million in 2010, 2009 and 2008, respectively.

Other comprehensive income for the year ended December 31, 2009 excludes a $20 million ($12 million after-tax) adjustment to AOCI representing the cumulative effect of the change in accounting principle related to the recognition and presentation of other-than-temporary impairments.
